Template.SubjectPart: ACTION REQUIRED - MMDL record for {{id}} needs added in SEA Tool
Template.HtmlPart:
This is a Urgent Reminder that there's no matching

record in SEA Tool for {{id}}


Either a record wasn't created in SEA Tool, or the SEA id in MMDL and SEA Tool doesn't Match

Failure to address this could lead to critical delay in the review process and

a deemed aproved SPA or waiver action.


if you have any questions, please contact the help desk at SEATool_helpDesk@cms.hhs.org
